thread.title: Enjoy 20% off cashmere at an exclusive J.Crew event
thread.title_full: Enjoy 20% off cashmere at an exclusive J.Crew event - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Enjoy 20% off cashmere at an exclusive J.Crew event
text: J.Crew has been making its supersoft, custom-coloured Italian cashmere collection for more than 30 years. It all starts with premium cashmere yarn that’s spun from the softest tops (or what they like to call fluffy wool from really fancy goats). These super-refined threads better absorb dye, allowing J.Crew to get the richest colours possible – think neon, heather grey, chartreuse and regal blue. The end result: jumpers you’ll have forever in colours you simply can’t find anywhere else. This season alone, they’ve made 40 colours and counting. To enjoy 20% off the cashmere range, come along to an exclusive event from 6.30-8.30pm on Wednesday 21 October at J.Crew's Sloane Square store.* Stephen Doig and Sophie Warburton from the Telegraph Fashion team will be on hand to provide styling tips and advice, and three lucky winners will have the chance to win a cashmere sweater of their choice. So what are you waiting for? Sign up now. *Tickets are limited to 125 pairs and will be allocated on a first come, first served basis. Maximum of one pair of tickets per applicant, subject to availability. Start browsing J.Crew's collection now » Online Form - Enjoy 20% off cashmere at an exclusive J.Crew event telegraph.co.uk
